file_content.text: Well, if it isn't Agent... uhm... hmph....
It'll come to me.
Well, if it isn't Lord... uhm... hmph....
Well, if it isn't Grand Champion... uhm... hmph....
Seems you've lost your manners along with your sobriety.
I've killed for lesser insults.
I thought everyone in the galaxy knew my name by now.
Buy me a drink or walk away. It's all the same to me.
Well, if it isn't Master... uhm... hmph....
Well, if it isn't Major... uhm... hmph....
Well, if it isn't Captain... uhm... hmph....
Your social life is your business.
Sobering, isn't it?
Nico Okarr. I could use a pilot of your caliber. Assuming you can still fly.
You haven't aged a day in thirty years, Nico. What's your secret?
Names fluctuate. My reputation has been built on aliases.
Step outside. I'll remind you.
Someone needs a cold shower. And a few hours of shut-eye.
Fame has never interested me. I serve the Force.
My dashing looks must've shaken your memory.
Keep your fancy spy talk. I'm a simple guy.
You look pretty dashed, all right.
How's that workin' out? The Force a good boss?
Smooth as a thranta.
Livin' right. And a little relic I found on Korriban. It's not important.
I'm tempted to walk away, but I could use your skills.
Usually how it goes.
Don't work for just anyone, though. Order a drink. Let's see what you're worth.
You must be joking.
I don't drink.
A drink to tell my worth?
I'll be the one drinking--not you. It's how I choose all my clients.
Humor me.
Can tell a lot about a lady by what she drinks.
Can tell a lot about a man by what he drinks.
Throw something together that you think represents who you are.
No better way to show it.
This better not be a scam.
All right. I'll mix something up.
[Refuse Quest] I don't have time for your games.
No skin off my back. I'll be here, if you change your mind.
If I wanted your credits, I'd already have them.
Go on. Surprise me.
Not just "something". Put thought into it.
Glass is half-empty. Ready to mix me up another?
Fine. I'll make you a drink.
Remember: it's gotta represent you.
[Refuse Quest] This is ridiculous.
Your call.
Got everything? I'm parched.
Glad my stomach's made of durasteel.
Bottoms up.
You will drink it and you will like it.
I put a lot of thought into the ingredients.
Whew. Few of those and I'll wake up missing credits. Let's call it, "Quick Draw".
Flavors work well together. Like a team. I'll call it, "The Last Defense".
The Force is strong with this one. Always wanted to say that.
Goes straight to your head. Calms the mind. Should call it, "Serenity".
Smooth. Subtle. Then hits you straight in the chest. Should call it, "The Saboteur".
Nothing like that burn. Warms the bones. I'll call it, the "Sarlacc and Loaded". Name of a great cantina.
Liquid rage. Throat'll be feeling that for a week. Let's call it, "Smash".
Doesn't want to stay down. We'll call this one, "Broken Chains".
Think "Saber Throw" is a good name for it.
Fitting. Now that you're hydrated, ready to join me?
If you're done, we've got work to do.
Job accepted, then?
Don't rush a good thing. This could be the start of a beautiful relationship.
I'm all yours.
I like your style, and this dump's lost its charm.
Mmm. Nice.
Watch the foam.
May want to let that breathe.
Fancy.
Good year.
Lived on that for months.
I won't be much use to you dead.
Don't forget the little umbrella.
You're gonna grind that up right?
Huh. Inventive.
Left 'em at the door.
Sorry. I'm spoken-for.
How? Did you write it in the sky?
But you're not here to discuss my good looks. You're lookin' to hire me.
I thought--
Seems--
I've killed--
My dashing--
Someone--
Fame has--
Names--
Step--
